Thought: As an engineering leader, what can I do to ensure we are successful?
Response: You will need a mission statement that your boss will agree upon.

Thought: This is about the stupidest plugin I have ever seen.
Ok smarty, give me a good strategic vision I can hang my hat on at the end of the day.
